Entry.JapaneseText: 最近、<Tytree>さんと<Hilda>さん、 なんか仲いいですね。もしかして……
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree> and <Hilda> have been getting along rather well lately. Could it be that the two of you are...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>、お、おまえ、 何が言いたいんだよ……！
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>... Wh-what are you trying to say?!

Entry.JapaneseText: あっ、<Tytree>が焦ってるぅ！ アヤシイ、アヤシイぞぉー！
Entry.EnglishText: Ah, <Tytree>'s all flustered! That's pre-tty suspicious!

Entry.JapaneseText: 悪いけど、私、年下には興味ないから。
Entry.EnglishText: Sorry, but I'm not into younger guys.

Entry.JapaneseText: な、お、おれだって、 お、おばさんには興味ないぜ！
Entry.EnglishText: Wha-... Well I-I'm not interested in old ladies!
